snippet.title: Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together (Coming Soon) Japanese Commercial
snippet.description:
They say video games are good for hand eye coordination. I wonder if an expert gamer could catch an arrow heading their way...The commercial is a bit cheesy, but the packaging is rather eye catching. Check out the translation of it: http://chrisaaronblog.blogspot.com/2024/01/enix-non-dragon-quest.html  Raw video taken from the "LEO" channel. 

My transcription of the audio：
ロール・プレイング　シミュレーション史上、初めての立体マップが
世界をこんなに美しく,奥深くした
伝説のオウガバトル第二弾
スーパーファミコンソフト「タクティクスオウガ」新発売
束縛か自由か、３人の意思が神々をも動かす。
